*** Bug 63378 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 72208 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
That can't be the right build. 200405140800 contaned a closing brace on line 304.

Duplicate bug 72208 says it happens on line 362 in M1. (AKA 200408122000)

This is the line that says "openAction.dispose()"

The marker views are assuming that createPartControl is always being called.
This is usually true in recent builds, but is not true in general.

Fixed in head.
